## slu kdev

Run sikalabs/dev in Kubernetes

```
slu kdev [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help           help for kdev
  -i, --image string   Container Image (default "sikalabs/dev")
  -s, --shell string   Shell to run in container (default "zsh")
```
